    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cannibalism()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the worm head runs into any part of its body while moving.
      void grow(javalib.worldimages.Posn loc, java.lang.String dir)
      Increases the worm segment count by one.

      Moves the worm in one direction indicated by keystroke.
      boolean outsideBounds(int width, int height)
      Returns a boolean indicating if the worm head is outside the bounds of the world canvas.

      Produces the image of the worm at its current location and color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Worm

        public Worm(javalib.worldimages.Posn start,
    int radius)

    • Method Detail

      • wormImage

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldImage wormImage()
        Produces the image of the worm at its current location and color.

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String ke)
        Moves the worm in one direction indicated by keystroke. Does this by removing the last segment of the worm, and inserting a new head segment to the first position in the array.

      • grow

        public void grow(javalib.worldimages.Posn loc,
        java.lang.String dir)
        Increases the worm segment count by one. Method is called when the worm eats food.

      • cannibalism

        public boolean cannibalism()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the worm head runs into any part of its body while moving.

      • outsideBounds

        public boolean outsideBounds(int width,
                    int height)
        Returns a boolean indicating if the worm head is outside the bounds of the world canvas.
